column5: Is it just me, or is Saturday always the windiest, crappiest day of the week????  Figured it had something to do with the fact that it is my only day off during our spring busy season. Got the 14 fter last September...starting to think I should have been looking for an 18 fter.
Doesn't matter how big your boat is you always need a couple of extra feet. It's called twofootitis for a reason.
Its okay I've been suffering from the same disease since I got my first boat. Doc says there is nothing they can do about it. It will go away when you get real old
Well, there's gotta be a starting point for twofootitis.... I've got no boat, and I'm pretty sure 2 feet wouldn't cut it.....   I think 12 is a good starting number, I'll go with that...
